languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, я желаю доложить о систематических и возмутительных покушениях на казну династии, совершаемых вашей спутницей Хейдари. Видит Император, худшие слухи о ее воровских привычках оказались значительным преуменьшением реальности!"

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, я желаю доложить о систематических и возмутительных покушениях на казну династии, совершаемых вашей спутницей Хейдари. Видит Император, худшие слухи о ее воровских привычках оказались значительным преуменьшением реальности!"

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: “大人，我必须向您报告，您的女伴海达利女士厚颜无耻，对王朝国库的进行了早有预谋的攻击。愿帝皇为我作证，关于她盗窃行为的传闻，哪怕是最糟糕的谣言，与她实际的罪行相比，都是九牛一毛！”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: “大人，我必须向您报告，您的女伴海达利女士厚颜无耻，对王朝国库的进行了早有预谋的攻击。愿帝皇为我作证，关于她盗窃行为的传闻，哪怕是最糟糕的谣言，与她实际的罪行相比，都是九牛一毛！”
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: 「陛下、私はミストレス・ヘイダリが王朝の財源を組織的かつ、明白に攻撃したことを報告せねばなりません。皇帝に誓って、彼女の盗みの手口に関する最悪の噂は、それでさえも控えめに広められたものであることが明らかになったのです！」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、私はミストレス・ヘイダリが王朝の財源を組織的かつ、明白に攻撃したことを報告せねばなりません。皇帝に誓って、彼女の盗みの手口に関する最悪の噂は、それでさえも控えめに広められたものであることが明らかになったのです！」
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo informar de una serie de ataques sistemáticos y flagrantes contra las arcas de la dinastía, perpetrados por su acompañante, la señora Heydari. ¡Al Emperador pongo por testigo de que los rumores más espantosos sobre su naturaleza ladrona seguían quedando por debajo de la realidad!».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, debo informar de una serie de ataques sistemáticos y flagrantes contra las arcas de la dinastía, perpetrados por su acompañante, la señora Heydari. ¡Al Emperador pongo por testigo de que los rumores más espantosos sobre su naturaleza ladrona seguían quedando por debajo de la realidad!».
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, je suis au regret de devoir vous signaler des attaques répétées et flagrantes sur les coffres de la dynastie, commises par votre amie, maîtresse Heydari. Que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin, la réalité de ses méfaits dépasse de très loin les pires rumeurs quant à ses vols ! »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, je suis au regret de devoir vous signaler des attaques répétées et flagrantes sur les coffres de la dynastie, commises par votre amie, maîtresse Heydari. Que l'Empereur m'en soit témoin, la réalité de ses méfaits dépasse de très loin les pires rumeurs quant à ses vols ! »
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch systematische und schamlose Angriffe auf die Kassen der Dynastie melden. Sie wurden von Herrin Heydari verübt. Der Imperator sei mein Zeuge, die schlimmsten Gerüchte über ihre diebischen Aktionen haben sich als wahr erwiesen. Die Realität spricht Bände!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, ich muss Euch systematische und schamlose Angriffe auf die Kassen der Dynastie melden. Sie wurden von Herrin Heydari verübt. Der Imperator sei mein Zeuge, die schlimmsten Gerüchte über ihre diebischen Aktionen haben sich als wahr erwiesen. Die Realität spricht Bände!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, hanedanlığın hazinelerine yoldaşınız Üstat Heydari tarafından gerçekleştirilen sistematik ve alçakça saldırıları raporlamak durumundayım. İmparator şahidim olsun ki hırsız oluşuna dair en beter söylentiler bile gerçeklerin yanında ciddi bir azımsama imiş!"
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, I must report systematic and flagrant attacks on the dynasty's coffers perpetrated by your companion Mistress Heydari. The Emperor as my witness, the worst rumours of her thieving ways proved to be a significant understatement of the reality!"

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, hanedanlığın hazinelerine yoldaşınız Üstat Heydari tarafından gerçekleştirilen sistematik ve alçakça saldırıları raporlamak durumundayım. İmparator şahidim olsun ki, bir hırsız oluşuna dair en beter söylentiler bile, gerçeklerin yanında ciddi bir azımsama imiş!"
traits.speaker: HighFactotum
